modName: Vampiric Thirst and Dark Maneuvers Compatibility Patch
summary: A compatibility patch for Vampiric Thirst and Dark Maneuvers
descriptionHtml:
This is a compatibility patch between Vampiric Thirst and Dark Maneuvers.

- It is now possible to increase Dark Maneuvers Vampire Lord Blood Pool with Vampiric Thirst's Blood Magic - Drain life.

Load order should be:

-Dark maneuvers
-Vampiric Thirst
- all others Vampiric Thirst patch (Royal Bloodline, Requiem)
-VT & DM patch
author: paromia

files.name: Vampiric Thirst and Dark Maneuvers Compatibility Patch
files.fileName: Vampiric Thirst and Dark Maneuvers Compatibility Patch-63373-1-0.rar
